name: TexanGreeter
0:
”Alexa, ask Texan Greeter to say hi to Sarah.”
”Alexa, ask Texan Greeter to greet Sarah.”
”Alexa, ask Texan Greeter to say hello to Sarah.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: texan greeter
des: Ask the skill to greet your friends and it will provide a greeting and some weather information based on your location and timezone. For the time-of-day and weather to function, permissions will need to be granted for your zip code.
